author: gstein
msg: These are constant arrays of data, rather than modifiable arrays. Mark
* svn_ra.h (get_log vtable func): constify the PATHS param

author: gstein
msg: More of the good old-fashioned SWIG work.

author: kfogel
msg: More "svn log" functionality: make log output show which paths
changed, and the nature of the change.  More work on filtering by
requested paths -- now all we need is a way for callers of
svn_repos_get_logs() to convert a relative repos path to absolute and
path filtering will work.  Not sure how to do this; see comments in
Document meanings of the values in the `changed_paths' hash.
(svn_repos_get_logs): Use above to detect changed paths, and to record
the nature of the change based on the node's action code.  Put in most
of the code needed for path filtering, plus comment about missing
ELEM_deleted_path): New enums for new elements.
* subversion/libsvn_ra_dav/fetch.c: All log code moved to new file
(log_end_element): Distinguish among added, deleted, and changed paths.
among added, deleted, and changed paths.
get_logs() to point to more info about path filtering.
